author: Deena Zaru
title: Meek Mill, Jay-Z charity sends masks to prisons to protect prisoners from coronavirus
description: Meek Mill's REFORM Alliance is sending masks to various correctional facilities as cases of inmates testing positive for the novel coronavirus rise in the U.S.
content:
The criminal justice reform organization founded by rappers Meek Mill and Jay-Z is sending personal protective equipment to prisons as cases of inmates testing positive for the novel coronavirus surge in various correctional facilities across the country.
